message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500.  I think it provides a lot of value and would be a great purchase for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value the product provides. I am willing to pay $8,800 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $9,200.  The value this product provides is truly significant.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $9,000 for it.
